title: Dirty Rich
description: Librarian note: Older covers for this edition can be found here: 10-Apr-2019, 27-Jun-2016.I finally met the man of my dreams…and he’s my new boss.It’s not easy working for the most demanding photography studio in all of New York City. In fact, it’s the hardest thing I’ve ever done.But the soul-crushing hours are going to be worth it someday. That’s what I keep telling myself. If I keep my head down and power through, I’ll have a glowing reference and a ticket to a stellar career.It’s all going to plan…until billionaire Jax Hunter buys us out.It’s hard to focus on photos with him in the office, wearing suits tailor-made for his mouthwatering body. And when he looks at me with those eyes, and whispers such dirty things in my ear…He’s irresistible.And our hot office fling is turning out to be far more serious than either of us imagined.If this goes south, I’ll lose my job.And it's already too late for my heart...
author: Amelia Wilde
